ing: 1 1/4 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
des: "A crusty, chewy pizza crust!  Our family's favorite! Try make two pizza crusts at once by removing the dough from the machine once it hits the rise cycle and place in a separate bowl. Now you are ready to begin the second crust!"
ins:
Place all ingredients in the bread machine pan in the order suggested by the manufacturer. Select dough cycle.
Remove after rise cycle and use with your favorite pizza recipe.
